data.title: Heisman Trophy winners, runners-up since 1935
data.meta_description: Here is every Heisman Trophy winner and runner-up in the trophy's history from 1935 to today.
data.text:
Here is a complete list of every Heisman Trophy winner since 1935 and the players that finished second and third each season. The award is given annually to the nation's most outstanding football player.

The 2023 Heisman Trophy ceremony was awarded to Jayden Daniels. The LSU quarterback became the third LSU player to win the award and the first since Joe Burrow took home the award in 2019.
